segments.text: I notice the sink overflowing slowly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is focused on her plate, totally unaware.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is spilling over, heading towards her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That puddle is growing fast on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is stretched out on that tilting stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One wrong move and he'll tumble down.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is right there, could get hurt too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Cookies in the jar, but this isn't safe.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window light makes it all seem too bright for danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her apron is getting wet from the splash.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hold my breath watching the stool wobble.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden looks safe, but inside it's risky.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Please, let nothing bad happen here.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Those cabinet doors are open, adding to the hazard.
segments.speaker: PAR
